title: Holiday Spirit
description: Spencer has no idea that this holiday season, everything is going to change.   But it isn't all good news.   Coming out to her family is more challenging than she thought it would be.   Her love life is about to get complicated too.   Having a crush on your philosophy professor is all fun and games until you realize you might actually have a chance with her.   Will Spencer pursue Abbey Vaughn or just continue to admire her from the back of the class?    Steamy Lesbian Christmas Romance Read for free with Kindle Unlimited
author: Lauren Trevino
